means.word_mean: 1. having the same sound (especially the same vowel sound) occurring in successive stressed syllables;

sentences.sentence: "note the assonant words and syllables in `tilting at windmills'"

means.word_mean: 2. having the same vowel sound occurring with different consonants in successive words or stressed syllables
